description: Researchers using basic satellite equipment intercepted thousands of unencrypted transmissions from space, exposing sensitive data such as corporate communications, text messages, and even government links. The study highlights major security flaws in satellite networks used worldwide. Experts warn the findings reveal how easily hackers could exploit these vulnerabilities without advanced tools.
title: Researchers Expose Shocking Vulnerabilities in Satellite Communications

description: India achieved a major step toward its first human spaceflight as ISRO successfully tested the Gaganyaan capsule’s parachute system. Dropped from a 2.5 km altitude, the 7.2-tonne dummy module deployed its 10 chutes flawlessly, ensuring a safe descent even under off-nominal conditions. This success validates a key safety system for crewed missions, moving India closer to launching astronauts aboard Gaganyaan by 2027 after further uncrewed test flights.
title: India Nears Human Spaceflight Goal with Successful Gaganyaan Parachute Drop

description: All the superheroes like Spidey, Iron Man, Hulk and others come together, and Marvel Spidey and Iron Man: Avengers Team Up, focuses on the friendship and union of these heroes to fight against Ultron and Goblin’s terrible plan.
title: Marvel Spidey and Iron Man: Avengers Team Up Now Streaming on JioHotstar

description: On Nov. 11, 2025, the Sun erupted with an X5.1-class flare, disrupting shortwave communications across Africa and Europe. The flare’s X-rays and UV radiation ionized Earth’s upper atmosphere, causing R3-level radio blackouts. NOAA warned that a coronal mass ejection could reach Earth on Nov. 12, potentially triggering strong geomagnetic storms and vivid auroras.
title: Sun Unleashes Strongest Flare of 2025, Causing Global Radio Blackouts

description: The OnePlus 15 is now available in India with introductory offers that lower its effective price below the official Rs. 72,999 starting rate for the 12GB + 256GB model. The flagship features a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, a triple 50-megapixel rear camera setup and a 32-megapixel selfie shooter. It packs a 7,300mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging and offers IP66, IP68, IP69 and IP69K protection.
title: OnePlus 15 Launched at Rs 72,999 but You Can Get It for Less: Here’s How

description: OnePlus 15 has been launched in India as the successor to the OnePlus 13. It is powered by Qualcomm’s flagship octa core Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, which is built on a 3nm process, paired with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 512GB of internal storage. The phone gets a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup, powered by OnePlus’ new DetailMax Image Engine. It runs on Android 16-based OxygenOS 16. The phone will be available in the country via Amazon in three colour options. It will be offered in two RAM and storage configurations.
title: OnePlus 15 Launched in India With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, 7,300mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus 15 has finally made its way to the Indian market; however, its arrival in India has been met with a hot debate, sparked by the company's decision to cut down on some specifications to improve others. However, do the compromises in terms of on-paper specifications translate into the real-world experience? Here's our OnePlus 15 review for you to find out.
title: OnePlus 15 Review: A Brilliant Phone, A Difficult Decision

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series camera specifications have been leaked online, hinting at what the rumoured flagship lineup might offer. The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is tipped to feature a quad rear camera setup, headlined by a 200-megapixel primary sensor. On the other hand, the Galaxy S26+ and Galaxy S26 could carry triple cameras, the same as this year's Galaxy S25 and Galaxy S25+. However, this is not the first time details regarding the cameras of the three phones have surfaced online.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Camera Specifications Tipped Again

description: GPT 5.1 arrives just months after GPT 5, offering a warmer tone, faster responses, and adaptive reasoning that lets the model decide when to think before replying. Testing shows smoother flow, clearer explanations, and better instruction adherence. Conversations feel friendlier, and writing is more human, though the model still leans heavily on bullet points. Accuracy is improved but not flawless, and domain-specific queries still require caution.
title: We Tested GPT-5.1 in ChatGPT: The Good, the Bad, and the Unexpected

description: Microsoft is giving college students free access to the Microsoft 365 Personal plan with Copilot for 12 months, expanding its usual three-month trial. Eligible undergraduate and postgraduate students can claim the offer until November 30. The plan supports up to five devices and includes premium Office apps, Copilot features such as Deep Research and Vision, and 1TB of cloud storage. The offer is limited to Canada, the UK, and the US.
title: Microsoft 365 Personal With Copilot Is Now Free for Students for One Year

description: Oppo’s Reno 15 lineup will debut in China on November 17, while the global and Indian variants are expected to launch by February 2026 with some changes from the Chinese models. According to a tipster that the global Reno 15 may cost around Rs. 43,000 and feature a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chip, a 6.59-inch 1.5K OLED 120Hz display and a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup. It is also tipped to include a 6,500mAh battery with 80W charging, Android 16-based ColorOS 16, Wi-Fi 7 and NFC.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series India Launch Timeline, Price Leaked; May Pack Different Chipset Than China Variant

description: Samsung Galaxy A57 could launch soon with the Exynos 1680 chipset. A new Samsung in-house chipset, believed to be the Exynos 1680, has now surfaced on the Bluetooth SIG certification website, hinting at an upcoming launch. The listing confirms both the chipset’s name and model number, suggesting it will launch soon with the Galaxy A57.
title: Samsung Exynos 1580 Chipset Surfaces on Bluetooth SIG Certification; Could Power the Galaxy A57

description: Directed by Jon M. Chu, Wicked is an American Musical Fantasy Film that is currently streaming on OTT.  The film revolves around the friendship of two witches, but is perceived differently due to a series of unfortunate events.
title: Jonathan Bailey’s Wicked is Now Streaming Online: Know Where to Watch This Film

description: The Tamil drama Marutham brings Vidaarth back in a performance filled with emotion and grit. Directed by V. Gajendran, it tells a compelling story of a farmer’s fight for truth and dignity. With strong reviews and an IMDb rating of 8.2/10, the series is now streaming exclusively on SunNXT from November 14, 2025.
title: Marutham OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Vidaarth’s Emotional Drama Online?

description: Valve announced a new PC/ console hybrid, called the Steam Machine, on Wednesday. The device runs SteamOS, but will allow users to install an OS of their choice. With the next Xbox also likely being a PC/ console hybrid running on Windows, the Steam Machine could signal the future of home consoles.
title: Valve Announces Steam Machine: What Does the PC/ Console Hybrid Say About Future Gaming Hardware?

description: Bitcoin hovered around $103,600 as the market stabilised following the end of the US government shutdown and early signs of regulatory progress. Altcoins moved in varied directions, reflecting cautious sentiment among traders. Analysts note growing long-term accumulation and improving clarity around upcoming US crypto policies. With whales adding positions and key support levels holding, Bitcoin may attempt another upward move if liquidity strengthens before the weekend.
title: Bitcoin Trades Near $103,600 as Market Awaits Clearer Macro Direction

description: Delhi Crime Season 3 is landing soon on the digital screens. The series stars Shefali Shah in the lead role, while Huma Qureshi has joined in.
title: Delhi Crime Season 3 Now Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need To Know About Plot, Cast, and More

description: Prime Video’s Dímelo Bajito brings Mercedes Ron’s next captivating story to life, featuring Alicia Falcó and Fernando Lindez in an emotional tale of love, memories, and rediscovery. Releasing December 12, 2025, the film promises to be another hit in the author’s growing cinematic universe.
title: Dímelo Bajito (Tell Me Softly) OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Meta may soon lose a key AI leader, with reports claiming Chief AI Scientist Yann LeCun is preparing to leave the company. As per a report, LeCun has informed colleagues of his plan to exit in the coming months and has already met investors about a potential startup. The move follows Meta’s shift toward AGI and restructuring that placed LeCun under new leadership.
title: Meta’s Chief AI Scientist Yann LeCun Reportedly Planning Exit to Become a Startup Founder

description: Moto G100s has been spotted testing on the Geekbench benchmarking platform, according to a tipster. The phone was listed with the XT2537-4 model number and an ARMv8 chip, which is said to be Qualcomm's Snapdragon 6s Gen 4 SoC. Additionally, the Geekbench listing of the phone also reveals its RAM capacity and Android version, while hinting at the performance it might offer. This could be the company's latest addition to its G series. The tech firm recently unveiled the Moto G100 (2025) in China.
title: Moto G100s Spotted on Geekbench With Snapdragon 6s Gen 4 Chip, Android 16

description: Watch the intense action drama, Liam Neeson as the main lone man, who is stuck between deadly conflicts and trying to protect his close ones in the One Man: Multiple Dangers is now streaming on Lionsgate Play.
title: One Man: Multiple Dangers is Now Streaming on Lionsgate Play

description: Redmi Turbo 5 could launch soon in India. Ahead of the official launch, an alleged render of the phone has surfaced online. It shows a hole-punch display and a dual rear camera unit. The Redmi Turbo 5 is rumoured to arrive in international markets as the Poco X8 Pro. It could go official later this month in China.
title: Redmi Turbo 5 Design Revealed in Leaked Render; Tipped to Feature Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chip

description: The Vivo V70 has appeared on Geekbench, reportedly listed under model number V2538, features the Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset with an Adreno 722 GPU, 8GB RAM and Android 16 with OriginOS 6. It scored 1,235 in single-core and 3,920 in multi-core tests. A tipster shared its OpenCL score of 4,848, indicating strong GPU performance. Meanwhile, the Vivo V70 Lite 4G previously surfaced on Bluetooth SIG and FCC sites, signalling an upcoming series launch.
title: Vivo V70 Reportedly Spotted on Geekbench With Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC

description: Apple is expanding its Apple Arcade lineup for the holiday season with several new titles. SpongeBob: Patty Pursuit 2 leads the December 4 releases, joined by PowerWash Simulator, Cult of the Lamb Arcade Edition, Subway Surfers+ and Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm+. Apple Vision Pro users will receive Glassbreakers: Champions of Moss on November 13. Apple Arcade costs Rs. 99 per month in India, supports up to six users per subscription and offers more than 200 games across iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple TV and Vision Pro.
title: Apple Arcade December 2025 Lineup Revealed: SpongeBob: Patty Pursuit 2, PowerWash Simulator, Cult of the Lamb and More

description: Based on the Batman from DC comics, the film follows a young Aztec noble emerging as a masked vigilante, only to save his kingdom from the Spanish and other evils.
title: Aztec Batman: Clash of Empires OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Google announced that it is revising its sideloading policy. It will allow advanced users to bypass this restriction and accept the risks of installing unverified apps. This change comes after developers raised concerns about limiting user choice and developer freedom. Google confirmed that it is building a new advanced flow that allows experienced users to accept the risks of installing software that isn't verified.
title: Google Will Now Allow 'Experienced Users' to Sideload Apps on Android

description: Your favorite OTT platforms are ready with the new set to releases where they will drop new movies and web series.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (Nov 10 - Nov 16): Dude, Nishaanchi, Jolly LLB 3, Delhi Crime Season 3, Jurassic World Rebirth, and More

description: PhonePe and OpenAI announced a strategic partnership on Thursday. The Indian Unified Payments Interface (UPI) platform will be integrating the San Francisco-based artificial intelligence (AI) giant’s technology within its platform. PhonePe highlighted that the move will improve the user experience on its platform and can help them make better and more informed decisions while making purchases.
title: PhonePe Partners With OpenAI to Integrate ChatGPT Within the UPI App

description: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold technical specifications and features have surfaced online, suggesting that it might pack a larger battery than Samsung's current flagship foldable phone, the Galaxy Z Fold 7. It could be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon chipset, too. Moreover, the handset will reportedly sport a 6.5-inch cover display and a 10-inch folding screen on the inside. Recently, a report highlighted, citing industry sources, that the company is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z TriFold next month.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Fresh Leaks Reveal 5,437mAh Battery, Snapdragon SoC, and More

description: Dell has launched the Dell Pro Plus Earbuds, a true-wireless headset designed for professional use with AI-based noise cancellation, Adaptive ANC and Microsoft Teams Open Office Certification. Priced at Rs. 18,699, the earbuds support Bluetooth 5.3, multi-device pairing, Dell Pair and come with an IP54 rating. Battery life is rated at up to 8 hours per charge and 33 hours with the case. Each earbud weighs 6g, and the package includes a USB-C receiver and cable.
title: Dell Pro Plus Earbuds Launched in India With ANC, Microsoft Teams Open Office Certification: Price, Features

description: Google yesterday announced a slew of updates for Pixel and other Android handsets, as part of its Pixel Drop for November 2025. It included features like Nano Banana in Messages, a new crisis badge for the VIP widget, and AI-powered summaries of chats. Among the myriad of additions is a new power-saving feature for Google Maps, which displays a simplified layout with only key information to conserve battery life. However, the company has announced that this feature will be limited to select Pixel models only.
title: Google Maps’ New Power Saving Mode is Exclusive to the Pixel 10 Series

description: Google has relaunched Cameyo as an enterprise tool that lets organisations run legacy Windows and Linux applications as web apps directly in Chrome. The virtual app delivery system removes the need for virtual desktops and supports tools ranging from ERP systems to AutoCAD. The move aligns with Google’s broader push to reduce enterprise dependence on Windows and drive adoption of ChromeOS.
title: Google Reintroduces Cameyo to Let Enterprises Run Windows Apps on Chrome Browser

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 8, which is expected to launch in 2026, could succeed the company's current foldable flagship, the Galaxy Z Fold 7. As the year ends, more details regarding the handset are surfacing online. Now, a report, citing industry sources, reveals that the Galaxy Z Fold 8 could be about 10 percent thinner and lighter than its predecessor, which measures 4.2mm when unfolded. Moreover, the company is planning to ship more units of the phone compared to the Galaxy Z Fold 7.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 8 Could be Thinner, Lighter Than its Predecessor to Increase Sales: Report

description: Samsung Movingstyle 27-inch portable touchscreen display (LSM7F) and 32-inch Movingstyle M7 Smart Monitor (M70F) have been launched in global markets. They run on One UI Tizen and offer features like Now Brief and Samsung Knox. The Movingstyle features a QHD screen with a 120Hz refresh rate. It is claimed to deliver up to three hours of battery life. They will receive seven years of OS updates.
title: Samsung Movingstyle Touchscreen Display Launched With Up to Three Hours Battery Life; Movingstyle M7 Tags Along

description: Honor 500 Pro and Honor 500 have now been listed on the company's website in China, revealing their RAM and storage configurations and colour options. The company recently teased the design of the lineup, while announcing that the series will be launched soon in China. The Honor 500 Pro will feature up to 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of onboard storage. Meanwhile, the standard model will offer up to 16GB of RAM and up to 512GB of storage. Both phones will be available in four colourways.
title: Honor 500 Pro, Honor 500 Listings Reveal Storage Variants, Colour Options

description: Valve has unveiled its next-generation PC/ console hybrid, called the Steam Machine. The device runs SteamOS out of the box, but allows users to install any OS they want. The console supports 4K gaming at 60fps and comes with the new Steam Controller. The Steam Machine will launch in early 2026.
title: Valve Enters Console Market Again With Steam Machine, a New PC/ Console Hybrid That Launches 2026

description: A teaser for the Vivo X300 series has been put up on Amazon ahead of its India launch. The upcoming lineup is expected to comprise two models --- Vivo X300 and X300 Pro. The handsets were launched globally on October 30 and are expected to make their way to the Indian market soon, equipped with MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipsets and Zeiss-tuned triple rear camera systems.
title: Vivo X300 Series With Zeiss-Backed Cameras Teased on Amazon Ahead of India Launch: Expected Specifications

description: Apple Intelligence was launched last year and is available to Apple devices. Now, Apple's website in the US has briefly listed "M2 or later" for Mac, sparking confusion among users. The official support pages still confirm M1 or later for Mac compatibility. The Apple Intelligence features are supported in iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max. The iPad Pro with M1 chip or later and the iPad Air with M1 chip or later are also listed as Apple Intelligence-compatible devices.
title: Apple Updates Website to Say Apple Intelligence Needs M2 Mac or Newer

description: iQOO has announced its monthly Service Day for November 14 to 16, offering free device maintenance across all its service centres in India. Customers will receive zero labour charges, free cleaning, sanitisation, software updates and select complimentary accessories, including a back case and protective film, subject to availability. The company noted that Service Day is held on the same dates every month. Users can locate nearby centres via the iQOO app or contact support at 1800-572-4700, 8527033881 or icare@iqoo.com.
title: iQOO Announces Service Day Benefits Including Free Back Case and Protective Film

description: OpenAI has launched the GPT-5.1 family of AI models, introducing GPT-5.1 Instant, Thinking, and Auto. The update improves tone, intelligence, and instruction adherence, making responses warmer and more natural. Paid users can access the models first, with a wider rollout planned later. The release also adds new personalisation presets, including Professional, Candid, and Quirky, to ChatGPT.
title: OpenAI Upgrades ChatGPT With GPT-5.1 AI Models, Brings Friendlier Conversations and Less Jargon

description: Steam Frame was announced on Wednesday by Valve as the tech firm's new virtual reality (VR) gaming headset. The company also unveiled, apart from the headset, a new gaming console, called Steam Machine, and a new Steam Controller. The Steam Frame is powered by a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, built on a 4nm process. It features 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of onboard storage. It sports two displays on the inside, which support passthrough mode. It also ships with two eye-tracking cameras on the inside and four cameras on the outside for controller and headset tracking.
title: Valve Steam Frame VR Gaming Headset Announced With Eye-Tracking Cameras: Availability, Specifications

description: UIDAI has launched a new Aadhaar app for Android and iOS to promote a paperless digital identity experience. Unlike the existing mAadhaar app, which focuses on Aadhaar-related services such as downloading e-Aadhaar and generating Virtual IDs, the new app enables users to store up to five Aadhaar profiles, share digital IDs securely, and use face authentication.
title: Aadhaar vs mAadhaar Key Differences Explained

description: With the launch of the iPhone 17 series now in the rear window, rumours about the next-generation iPhone 18 series are surfacing. According to a tipster, next year’s top-of-the-line model could be the heaviest iPhone to date. The handset, ubiquitously known as the iPhone 18 Pro Max, is tipped to be heavier and thicker than the iPhone 17 Pro Max, tipping the scales at more than 240g. However, it remains unknown why this change will happen.
title: iPhone 18 Pro Max Tipped to Be Heavier and Thicker than iPhone 17 Pro Max

description: With the launch of the OnePlus 15 on the horizon, rumours about its successor have already begun surfacing. According to a recent report, a future model from the company could feature a display with a 240Hz refresh rate. This potentially translates into a considerable upgrade over the OnePlus 15, which is confirmed to debut a new 165Hz panel. It is expected to make the smartphone’s performance smooth when swiping between apps, scrolling through feeds, and playing games.
title: OnePlus 16 to Reportedly Come With a 240Hz Dynamic Refresh Rate Screen

description: UIDAI has launched a new Aadhaar app for Android and iOS to promote a paperless digital identity experience. Unlike the existing mAadhaar app, which focuses on Aadhaar-related services such as downloading e-Aadhaar and generating Virtual IDs, the new app enables users to store up to five Aadhaar profiles, share digital IDs securely, and use face authentication.
title: Aadhaar vs mAadhaar Key Differences Explained

description: OnePlus 15 is scheduled to be launched in India and the global markets on November 13. The brand has teased several details about its upcoming flagship, including battery capacity, durability rating, and operating system ahead of its debut. From the OnePlus 15 price in India to its features and specifications, here’s everything you need to know.
title: OnePlus 15 Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More
